You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesA A] > &and;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&And;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2a53/index.htm U+02A53].
  * `&and;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/2227/index.htm U+02227].
